channel.title: Microsoft Windows on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Windows on Cisco Skills

item.title: Windows 8 Developer Preview
item.description:
Changing topics for today, I want to talk about the Windows 8 Developer Preview which was released on September 13th. I had the time to install it under virtual box and was pleasantly surprised! About how fast it installed the easy to understand install prompts and the new "Metro" UI which is aimed at touched devices. Also the ability to switch to the standard Windows operating system. This is an alpha build so it's not even on at the beta stages yet, Take a look for yourself! [slideshow] Want to try it for yourself check out Windows 8 Developer Preview downloads. This is an alpha build and can be unstable. I would use a virtual machine to test it. Although short to the point that's all I have so check back for other posts. What do like about Windows 8 DP? What don't you like? Comment below.
